name: move-bytecode-template
description: Move Binary Format implementation in WASM

scripts.build:release: wasm-pack build --target web --release --scope mysten; wasm-pack build --target nodejs --release --out-dir pkg/node --scope mysten; jq -s '.[0] * .[1]' pkg/package.json exports.node.json > pkg/new.package.json; mv pkg/new.package.json pkg/package.json

author: Mysten Labs <build@mystenlabs.com>
